title: Mystery Science Theater 3000 end credits
content:
Hi All,

Does anyone know what typeset is used for the end credits of Mystery Science Theater 3000?

It looks oddly like the font used for this message.

Here's a screen cap of the credits if that helps.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415031442im_/http:/typophile.com/files/end%20credits_3902.jpg)

This screen cap is from a 1989 episode.

Thanks!

SubBot
author: SubBot

comments.content: Not the same as this message font, which has a lower case h ascending higher that the upper case T, unlike your sample.
The MST3K screen cap font is Cheltenham (1896, Bertram Grosvenor Goodhue and Ingalls Kimball).

I think you nailed it!

Thanks, PublishingMojo!

I think the closest thing so far is Cheltenham Bold. But it still isn't quite right.

Here's another screen cap.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415031442im_/http:/typophile.com/files/copyright_4426.jpg)

The 8, S, I and N look a little different.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415031442im_/http:/typophile.com/files/comparison_6399.jpg)

SubBot
